Resample¶

Resample data.

Inputs

  • Raw

  • Epochs

  • Evoked

Outputs

  • Raw: Resampled Raw

  • Epochs: Resampled Epochs

  • Evoked: Resampled Evoked

Use

  1. Sample rate to use - Set sampling frequency.

Example¶

More information filter in Raw here. More information filter in Epochs here. More information filter in Evoked here.
